input_text:
Job Title: Project Manager

Location: Schaumburg, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
What are we looking for in our Project Manager?

RussellTobin is hiring for a Project Manager/ Project Engineer in Schaumburg, IL 60173, for an Engineering firm that assists clients with packaging conversions and process improvements. Apply today for consideration !

Project Manager

Schaumburg, IL 60173, United States

Duration: Permanent

Salary range: $ 58K-60K/Year. 

Job Description

We are looking for a PM or PE. Someone with an engineering or manufacturing background or experience (Doesn’t have to be a degree).

They should organized, can handle multiple things at a time, and should have good communication skills.

Day-To-Day Tasks

Communication & reporting to managementHelp management with presentations to customers and clientsManagement/interaction with engineersManagement of projects, staff schedules, clients, and in-office tasksManaging multiple projects concurrentlyPreparation of drawing/design packages, documentation/implementation lists, installation/equipment specifications and other related documentsTravel to site facilities for client meetings, field surveys, audits, facility documentation, client project management or field engineering, commissioning, and start-up supportResearch of industry trends for use with current and/or new clients

What you need to Succeed:

Bachelor’s degree in engineering preferredExperience in Project ManagementKnowledge of project documentation including drawing/design packages, installation/equipment specifications, technical/maintenance manuals, and other related documentsProficient in Microsoft Office, Project, and other related programsLeadership, interpersonal and communication skills for leading a teamAbility/flexibility to travel

Career Path

The next step to advancement is Senior Project ManagerOr non-traditional next step, advancement in a direction of your choiceQualifications shall include the following:Proven performance in current positionSkills to consult with a client on technical issues and defining scope of workExcellent leadership qualities in directing major project teams & staffDemonstrates a thorough understanding of engineering operations and practices

Pride Global and its affiliates - including Russell Tobin, Pride Health, and Pride Now - offer eligible employees comprehensive healthcare coverage (medical, dental, and vision plans), supplemental coverage (accident insurance, critical illness insurance and hospital indemnity), a 401(k)-retirement savings, life & disability insurance, an employee assistance program, identity theft protection, legal support, auto and home insurance, pet insurance, and employee discounts with some preferred vendors.

#CB

Rate/Salary: $58K - $60K+/Yearly

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
